entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
